name: B. Petya and Square
statement:
Little Petya loves playing with squares. Mum bought him a square in
size. Petya marked a cell inside the square and now he is solving the
following task.The task is to draw a broken line that would go along the
grid lines and that would cut the square into two equal parts. The
cutting line should not have any common points with the marked cell and
the resulting two parts should be equal .Petya wants to determine
whether it is possible to cut the square in the required manner given
the sizes of the square side and the coordinates of the marked cell.
Help him.
